issue.title: [C++] Insufficient description on build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3996](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3996). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
C / C ++ version of Ubuntu Linux environment requires less library / component description.

Requirement
- g ++
- autoconf
- Jemalloc
  
  In accordance with the above, you need to add the following to the library / component you install with apt-get install.
  
- libboost-regex-dev
- libjemalloc-dev
- autotools-dev
